name: Paz and the Shattered Soul
description:
For years Paz has felt parts of himself wither away, and now he finds himself falling into a dark cave face to face with the one who Shattered his Soul. Can Paz recover what was once lost and become whole?

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Heavy Attack: Q
Light Attack: E
Jump: SPACE
Dash: SHIFT

Audio: Owen Davenport

Level Design: Sean Barker

Art/Animation: Peter Barthelmess

Programing: Ike Lacey
